attributes.action: MORE FIXED TICKETS FOR THE POLICE - SAVE POLICE TIME
attributes.additional_details:
WE THE UNDERSIGNED WISH TO SEE MORE `FIXED TICKETS` GIVEN TO THE POLICE TO FREE UP THERE TIME AND THE COURTS, THESE SHOULD BE AT A STARTING BRACKET OF £80 UP AND MORE POINTS IF A DRIVING OFFENCE, THIS STOPS LONG HOURS BY THE POLICE AFTER DUTY ON PAPERWORK, THIS IS ALSO AN INSTANT PENALTY AND SO HITS HOME QUICKER.

THIS SHOULD BE ADOPTED ON THE USE OF MOBILE PHONES WITH A HIGHER FINE AND MORE POINTS AS THE ONE AT THE MOMENT HAS HAD LITTLE EFFECT AS SEEN EACH DAY ON THE ROADS.
